response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and innovation. I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000, believing that its true worth far exceeds this amount.
